articles.description: While Bobby Deol and Kajol had a happy reunion as their film 'Gupt' clocked 25 years, Manisha Koirala who had an equally important role in the film was nowhere to be seen at the event. Did the filmmaker Rajiv Rai not invite her? Well, nobody as yet has got do…
